document_data.name: Stumble
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stumble''''' was a [[Combat sphere|combat]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition that would cause a creature to lose their footing.{{Southernmagic}}
document_data.Effects: Unless resisted, this spell caused a target creature within {{SI|60|ft}} of the caster to continually trip and lose their balance until the spell expired.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and [[somatic component|somatic components]], this spell required a drop of [[oil]] as a material component.
